message.body: On the train to NJ now, will let you know when we're on the road to Ithaca.
Ok - can't wait to see you! Have blueberries, sweet corn and Purity ice cream for you !
Just escaped a long traffic jam before 380, going to be more like 12:30 I think :(
Ok- have a fan going in your room and looking for one for #####'s room. Cooling down :)
